name: Venturesome Academic
description: You're a classically trained Academic, a product of the universities of the Brass City, the Palace of Tigers, or some other less prestigious centre of learning among the spheres.

possessions.name: Reading Glasses in a sturdy case (you cannot read without them)

special: You may Test your Luck to recall facts that you might reasonably be expected to have encountered relating to the natural sciences and humanities.
